<MethodEndpoint
  method={"put"}

>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Update dependency configurations for a specific language

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

  parameters={[{"name":"language","in":"path","required":true,"description":"Programming language (python, node, etc.)","schema":{"type":"string"}}]}
>

  title={"Body"}

>
